docs.text: Graph Language Repo : https://github.com/nash-raf/Graph-language- Tutorial : See Tutorial
docs.title: Graph Language

docs.text: Tutorial: Loading a graph This language will let you describe graphs and load them from a simple edgelist file. Example edge list format Suppose we have an 'edgelist.txt' file with the following edegs: 0 1 1 2 1 3 2 4 We can define and load the graph like this: graph g { edges: file 'edgelist.txt'; }; This would tell the language to create a graph g and load its edges from the file edgelist.txt
docs.title: Tutorial: Loading a graph
